<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Holistic Care](/Feats.aspx?ID=2030) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 184 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Medic](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=69)

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6); [Treat Condition](/Feats.aspx?ID=2029)

</column>

---

You provide emotional and spiritual care. Add [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19), [stupefied](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37), and [stunned](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36) to the list of conditions you can reduce with [Treat Condition](/Feats.aspx?ID=2029). If the stunned condition has a duration instead of a value, you can't use Treat Condition to reduce it.
